Amazing Mexican food!  Being from Chicago, my expectations for mexican food are high. Tlaxcal not only lived up to them but surpassed them.  Being vegetarians, my husband and I had hard time finding many options to eat in Spain through our 10 day trip.  We were so happy to find this place as it had many options! It definitely satisfied our mexican food craving being away from home! We had their Guacamole (must try), Nachos, and enchiladas.  They were all great!  They also gave bunch of salsas on the side, which were a great compliment to everything that we ordered.  You don't have to look anywhere else if you want a great mexican meal in Barcelona!
